item.description: Hundreds of us are adding our name to the call to raise minimum wage to ¬£15 per hour. Add your name too on @organisehq ‚úèÔ∏è https://t.co/9hLwtknOex

item.description: I just signed this petition via @organisehq calling for a pay rise in line with inflation for all public sector workers. Add your name too: https://t.co/31UM9uTRue
